INTERSHOP IOM 4.8.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 8ee926f81393b5181cac82e4a3ea2871a732af9a)

Table omt.CustomPropertyPresentationDTO

Properties that should be displayed in a custom block.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
group varchar NOT_NULL The group of the custom property that should be displayed. 
key varchar NOT_NULL The key of the custom property that should be displayed. 
CustomBlockDTO customBlockRef integer NOT_NULL The customer block where the property should be displayed in. 
rank integer The ascending order the row should be displayed in the block. 
PresentationType presentationTypeRef integer NOT_NULL 1 The presentation that should be used for the value of the property. 
label varchar The label to display for the value of the property. 
description varchar The description of the row that will be displayed as a tooltip. 
hideIfValueEmpty boolean NOT_NULL false Whether to hide this row, if the value of the property is empty. 
active boolean NOT_NULL true Whether the block should be displayed. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY CustomPropertyPresentationDTO_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) 
FOREIGN KEY CustomPropertyPresentationDTO_fk_CustomBlockDTO FOREIGN KEY ("customBlockRef") REFERENCES "CustomBlockDTO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY CustomPropertyPresentationDTO_fk_PresentationType FOREIGN KEY ("presentationTypeRef") REFERENCES "PresentationType"(id)
